definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Cytokines are small, soluble proteins with pleiotropic effects on a variety of cell types.
sentences.chinese: 细胞因子是具有多种生物活性的可溶性小分子蛋白质。

sentences.english: The fluctuation curves of the total soluble sugar and the total acid in peel were W-shaped.
sentences.chinese: 果皮可溶性糖和总酸含量动态变化曲线均为“W”形。

sentences.english: The development of bio-soluble refractory fibres was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 总结了可溶性耐火纤维生物性能的测试方法。

sentences.english: The soluble dietary fiber is the konjac flour or sodium alginate powder.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性膳食纤维为魔芋精粉或海藻酸钠粉。

sentences.english: Soluble fiber is the kind that slows down the rate of absorption of sugars.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性纤维会降低你的糖类摄入速度。

sentences.english: The poly (amic acid) exhibited good solubility in common organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 该聚酰胺酸在普通有机溶剂中具有良好的可溶性。

sentences.english: But it showed no effect on the contents of the solids and titrable acids.
sentences.chinese: 但对可溶性固形物和可滴定酸含量无明显影响。

sentences.english: The soluble protein in the supernatant was separated with the precipitate after ultrasonic cytolysis and centrifugation.
sentences.chinese: 超声裂菌，离心后收取上清中的可溶性蛋白。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a method for determination of dissolvable zinc salt in deodorizing cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究除臭剂等化妆品中可溶性锌盐的测定方法。

sentences.english: The content of soluble solids of CPPU treated fruits was not significantly different from that of control fruits.
sentences.chinese: 处理果与对照果的可溶性固形物含量无显著差异。

sentences.english: Table 5 Effect of shading on sugar content of cob and grain pedicel …
sentences.chinese: 可溶性糖含量及籽粒小穗柄维管束截面积的影响。

sentences.english: Furthermore, it can increase the soluble sugar content and free-proline content in leaves.
sentences.chinese: 盐分胁迫还使叶片中的脯氨酸和可溶性糖含量增加。

sentences.english: The content of fruit soluble solids and total sugars are higher significantly and flavour is strong sweet.
sentences.chinese: 果实可溶性固形物及总糖含量显著高，果味浓甜。

sentences.english: He took some soluble tablets first to keep himself warm.
sentences.chinese: 首先他吃了些可溶性的药丸来使自己暖和些。

sentences.english: The reserve of solvable potash resources is lack and imbalance seriously in China.
sentences.chinese: 我国可溶性钾矿资源储量少，而且分布极不平衡。

sentences.english: The prescription and the preparation process of ribavirin soluble powder have been introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了利巴韦林可溶性粉的处方和制备方法。
